title: Seattle City Council Select Committee on Campaign Finance Reform 1/7/20
description:
The purpose of the Select Committee is to review legislation relating to campaign finance reforms and make a final recommendation to the City Council. This Select Committee will expire once legislation with a final recommendation is made and sent to the City Council.

Agenda: Public Comment; CB 119730: related to elections - limiting contributions to independent expenditure committees; CB 119731: related to elections - prohibiting foreign-influenced corporations from making independent expenditures or contributing to campaigns and independent expenditure committees; CB 119732: related to political advertising and qualified public communications.
Advance to a specific part 
Public Comment - 1:45
CB 119730, CB 119731, CB 119732: related to elections - limiting contributions; prohibiting foreign contributions; related to political advertising - 16:45
